string-array.name: warning_tips
string-array.item: Many cities tow during street cleaning hours even if signs are faded—double-check the schedule.
Temporary construction signs often override regular rules. Scan the whole block before you park.
Pay-by-phone zones can still ticket if you’re outside the zone code—verify the number on the sign.
Time limits reset after posted end times; overnight often has different rules.
Check both sides of the street—restrictions can alternate by day or time.

resources.string:
ParkAware is about bringing the community together to raise awareness of safety issues around parking and other parking related issues that impact our lives every day, through education and transparent and respectful reporting.
How It Works • Share sightings of parking enforcement officers (respectfully) • Get parking reminders and location alerts • Stay informed about council-related activity
Founded in 2025 Contact: admin@parkaware.app

Last Updated: 01/07/2025
ParkAware is a community-driven application developed to promote parking awareness, encourage safe and lawful behaviour, and help users stay informed about parking restrictions, enforcement presence, and related council matters.
By using ParkAware, you acknowledge and agree to the following:
1. Informational Purposes Only The content and alerts provided by ParkAware are offered for general informational purposes only. They are not intended to be, nor should they be considered, professional advice or legally binding instructions. You remain fully responsible for complying with all applicable parking laws, signage, and local government regulations.
2. No Guarantee of Accuracy While we aim to provide up-to-date and relevant information, ParkAware may rely on user-submitted, third-party, or publicly available data and cannot guarantee accuracy or timeliness.
3. No Liability for Fines or Incidents ParkAware is not liable for parking infringements, towing, damage, or losses resulting from parking decisions or use of the App.
4. Respectful Conduct Any use of the App to incite or support abuse, threats, or harassment toward Police Officers, Council Rangers, or Parking Officers is strictly prohibited.
5. No Use While Driving Do not interact with the App while driving.
6. Changes and Updates This Disclaimer may be updated at any time without notice.
7. Contact Use the feedback form on the Contact Us screen.
